# Introduction

## About the authors

This is the project report by Dongyuan Gao and Daniel Huber, master students at the HSLU University, in the module "Time Series Analysis in Finance" in spring 2025.


## Contextual Background

Brief overview of monetary policy and inflation dynamics in Switzerland.
Importance of understanding policy rate interactions with core
inflation. Brief introduction to the role of the Swiss National Bank
(SNB).

## Problem Statement

Explanation of the specific problem: understanding how SNB policy rates
and Swiss core inflation rates interact dynamically. Brief justifiction
why this relationship is economically relevant or timely.
